reviewText: Absolutely brilliant. Acting is terrible, story lines make nearly no sense and still it's a must see for anyone with an appreciation for film as art. It's the low-budget amateurish feel which causes this collection to be conversation worthy and worth adding to a decent home collection. I recommend starting with The Fear which I caught on fandor before seeing this collection and was the reason for seeking Experiments In Terror 2 out.

Total waste of money ! I bought all 3 of these so called Experiments in Terror sadley ! Stories were crap ! Camera work was even worse and acting was non existent !! Absolute Rubbish and the producers should be ashamed felt cheated !!!
